name: app_cherrypy
long_description:
Description
===========
Cherry Py application LWRP implementation. Currently used for the scraper platform.
Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

app_cherrypy/script.display_name: Python script to start the daemon.
app_cherrypy/script.description: Relative path for the CherryPy daemon. Should be relative to the application directory

recipes.app_cherrypy::default: Installs the files for the DM scraper.
